author: James Martin
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently sauté the sweet potato, sweetcorn, garlic and thyme for 5-8 minutes.  Add the wine and stock and cook for ten minutes.   Place in a blender and blend until smooth.  Add the cream and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ sweet potato, diced,  50g/1¾oz sweetcorn,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  2 sprigs fresh thyme,  50ml/1¾fl oz white wine,  200ml/7fl oz chicken stock or vegetable stock,  50ml/1¾fl oz double cream,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
